channel.title: yudel tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from yudel.

item.description: @scalzi Assuming you had sold a billion copies of each of your novels and therefore were able to swing the purchase price, would you go for it?
item.source:markdown: @scalzi Assuming you had sold a billion copies of each of your novels and therefore were able to swing the purchase price, would you go for it?

item.description: “When we walked into the classroom on that first week of September, we noticed the single ditto sheets on the tops of each of our desks as Joe Fili, senior English teacher, told us to sit down and read the words we saw printed.” https://t.co/YGlWlJ6mY0
item.source:markdown: “When we walked into the classroom on that first week of September, we noticed the single ditto sheets on the tops of each of our desks as Joe Fili, senior English teacher, told us to sit down and read the words we saw printed.” https://t.co/YGlWlJ6mY0

item.description: @HillelBro @typolad fyi
item.source:markdown: @HillelBro @typolad fyi

item.description: @ZacharyBraiterm Well, I see a real reluctance by the organized center to call out the Republican Party by name, even when they’re all blocking efforts to stop white supremacists.
item.source:markdown: @ZacharyBraiterm Well, I see a real reluctance by the organized center to call out the Republican Party by name, even when they’re all blocking efforts to stop white supremacists.

item.description: @ZacharyBraiterm Probably more urgent, but less likely, to see a divorce between elements of the organized Jewish community and the white nationalists.
item.source:markdown: @ZacharyBraiterm Probably more urgent, but less likely, to see a divorce between elements of the organized Jewish community and the white nationalists.

item.description: @quamona_rimby @MisfitTorah Nah, this is just on the level of spotting a license plate with “MAZEL” as its tag. The joke is the juxtaposition of two ostensibly different worlds.
item.source:markdown: @quamona_rimby @MisfitTorah Nah, this is just on the level of spotting a license plate with “MAZEL” as its tag. The joke is the juxtaposition of two ostensibly different worlds.

item.description:
It is insane. It is crazy enough that we should be considering malicious intent. https://t.co/dDAGyDdWMu

As I posted a year ago: https://t.co/rAJI5H6ss3

We don’t talk enough about the possible Chinese ties of Rupert Murdoch and Mitch McConnell, the two most powerful Republicans.
item.source:markdown:
It is insane. It is crazy enough that we should be considering malicious intent. https://t.co/dDAGyDdWMu
As I posted a year ago: https://t.co/rAJI5H6ss3
We don’t talk enough about the possible Chinese ties of Rupert Murdoch and Mitch McConnell, the two most powerful Republicans.

item.description: Amazing stories from the drummer on Dylan’s band in the years I saw many concerts. “Bob stops me with his arm. He says, "We got to do something about that girl."” https://t.co/5zCdNomoNe

item.description: @YehudaKurtzer Nepotism is fine, but don’t let it blind you to the importance of requiring NDAs from all your employees.
item.source:markdown: @YehudaKurtzer Nepotism is fine, but don’t let it blind you to the importance of requiring NDAs from all your employees.

item.description: @AkivaMCohen Not at all! It may have peaked, but it’s not over. For example: Can AJ sue his attorney for malpractice for improperly revealing material that he improperly withheld from discovery?
item.source:markdown: @AkivaMCohen Not at all! It may have peaked, but it’s not over. For example: Can AJ sue his attorney for malpractice for improperly revealing material that he improperly withheld from discovery?

item.description: @datadivajf Seems like her mistake is not subscribing to Paramount+ and simply watching Star Trek around the clock, with occasion breaks for old Mission Impossible reruns.
item.source:markdown: @datadivajf Seems like her mistake is not subscribing to Paramount+ and simply watching Star Trek around the clock, with occasion breaks for old Mission Impossible reruns.

item.description:
Everything I know about Vin Scully I learned from this song. And it’s why I can appreciate the depth of feeling felt by those who listened to his broadcasts of the LA Dodgers. https://t.co/pDGH5LaSl2

I will confess to being initially confused by this song, having only known of the east coast radio hero Vin, Vin Scelsa.
item.source:markdown:
Everything I know about Vin Scully I learned from this song. And it’s why I can appreciate the depth of feeling felt by those who listened to his broadcasts of the LA Dodgers. https://t.co/pDGH5LaSl2
I will confess to being initially confused by this song, having only known of the east coast radio hero Vin, Vin Scelsa.
